title: AI-STEAM Experiential Project-Based Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical competency-building course for in-service elementary teachers integrating AI technologies into STEAM education

learning_goals: Learners can develop educational apps utilizing the image classification feature of MIT App Inventor
Learners can design and implement AI-integrated STEAM education projects
Learners can propose AI-STEAM class operation plans based on experiential learning theory
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
